meanings.definition: Situated or occurring behind the vena cava.
meanings.sent1: The postcaval position of the heart was noted in the anatomy class.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the postcaval location of the tumor on the scan.
meanings.sent3: The postcaval placement of the chair in the room made it hard to reach.
meanings.sent4: Her postcaval decision to move to a new city surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The postcaval shadow of the tree stretched across the yard.

meanings.sent1: The surgeon carefully avoided the postcaval during the procedure.
meanings.sent2: Blood flowed smoothly through the postcaval in the patient's body.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to play with the postcaval dangling from the table.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like a strong postcaval guiding him through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the postcaval in the anatomy model fascinated the students.
